308a6('dul ba): dge slong dag pa lta ba med pa la/ gzhi med par pham par 'gyur ba'i chos kyis bkur ba btab pa las/ de dus gzhan zhig na dris kyang rung mo dris kyang rung / rtsod pa de yang gzhi
308a7('dul ba): med pa zhig yin la/ dge slong yang zhe sdang la gnas pas/ zhes sdang gis smras so zhe na/ dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa re shig dge slong gis
308a8('dul ba): dge slong la gzhi ma mchis par pho nya las pham par 'gyur ba'i chos kyis bkur ba btab pa cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// de bzhin du yi ge dang / lag brda'
308b1('dul ba): dang gzhan la snyad 'dogs pa dang brgyud pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ston pa zhig la skur pa btab
308b2('dul ba): na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyuraro// de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor bas nyam thag pa dang / 'on pa dang glen pa dang / gnyid log pa dang / phyag las khom
308b3('dul ba): pa dang / rab tu myos pa dang / snyoms par zhugs pa dang / 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa'i dge slong la gzhi ma mchis par/ 'pham par 'gyur ba'i chos kyis skur pa btab
308b4('dul ba): na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis 'di las phyi rol pa gzhan mu stegs can dang / dge slong dang / bram ze dang / spod pa dang /
308b5('dul ba): kun tu rgyu ba rnams gzhi ma mchis par/ pham pa'i chos kyis bskur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// skad dang lus dang dben sngags dang / gzhan gyis
308b6('dul ba): gzhan phyir skur pa btab/ khyim pa dag la stsogs pa dang / mtshan rnams dang ni bzhi tshan no// btsun pa re shig dbus gis dge slong gis/ mtha' 'khob pa'i skad
308b7('dul ba): dbus kyis dge slong shig la gzhi ma mchis par 'pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab la/ yul dbus pa'i dge slong gis kyang / mtha' 'khob pa'i skad de ma 'tshal na
308b8('dul ba): cir 'gyur lags nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// mtha' 'khob pas dbus pa'i skad du/ mtha' 'khob pa'i dge slong la gzhi ma mchis par 'pham pa'i chos kyis skur
309a1('dul ba): ba btab la mtha' 'khob pa'i dge slong gis kyang / yul dbus pa'i skad de mtshal na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyuro// mtha'
309a2('dul ba): 'khob pas mtha' 'khob pa'i skad du dbus pa'i dge slong la gzhi ma mchis par 'pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab la/ yul dbus pa'i dge slong gis kyang mtha' 'khob
309a3('dul ba): ba'i skad de ma tshal na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// dbus pas dbus pa'i skad du/ mtha' 'khob pa'i dge slong la zhig ma mchis par 'pham
309a4('dul ba): pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab la/ mtha' 'khob pa'i dge slong gis kyang dbus pa'i skad de ma tshal na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// btsun pa re shig
309a5('dul ba): dge slong gis lus kyis rnam par rig byed kyis dge slong la ma mchis par 'pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// btsun
309a6('dul ba): pa re shig dge slong gis dben par 'du shes pas/ gzhi ma mchis par 'pham pa'i chos kyis bskur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// dben pa la
309a7('dul ba): mi dben par 'du shes pas/ gzhi ma mchis pa la 'pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// mi dben pa la dben par 'du
309a8('dul ba): shes pas/ gzhi ma mchis par 'pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// mi dben pa la mi dben par 'dus shes
309b1('dul ba): bas/ gzhi ma mchis par 'jam pa'i chos kyis skur ba btab na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis sman
309b2('dul ba): nam gsang sngags kyis bdag nyid mi gda' bar bgyis te/ dge slong la bzhi ma mchis par 'pham pa'i chos skur pa btab ni cir 'gyur lags/ nyes
309b3('dul ba): pa sbom por 'gyur ro// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis gzhan las dge slong zhig la/ gzhi ma mchis par pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur
309b4('dul ba): lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong gzhan rnams kyi slad du gzhi ma mchis par 'pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir
309b5('dul ba): 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyuraro// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis khyim pa la gzhi ma mchis par 'pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byaso//
309b6('dul ba): za ma dang / ma ning dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang / ma bsod pa dang / pha gsod pa dang / dgra bcom pa gsod pa dang / mu rtogs can dang / mu stegs can du zhugs
309b7('dul ba): pa dang / kutha su gnas pa dang / dang po mi mthun pa can dang / sngar lta ba byung ba la gzhi ma mchis par 'pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur
309b8('dul ba): lags/ nyes pa sgom par por 'gyur ro// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis/ dge slong ma la gzhi ma mchis par 'pham par 'gyur pa'i chos kyis
310a1('dul ba): skur ba btab na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyuraro// dge 'dun dben bgyid pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems/
310a2('dul ba): kyis khrag 'byin pa dang / gnas par bya ba dang / tha dad du gnas pa dang / khas blangs pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa'i dge slong la gzhi ma mchis par 'pham
310a3('dul ba): pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro// btsun pa re shig dge slong zhig gis/ dge slong la gzhi ma mchis
310a4('dul ba): par 'pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa 'debs pa las/ de'i mtshan gyur te/ dge slong mar red na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro// btsun pa re
310a5('dul ba): shig dge slong ma zhig gis/ dge slong ma gzhi ma mchis par 'pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa 'debs pa las/ de'i mtshan gyur te/ dge slong du red na cir 'gyur
310a6('dul ba): lags dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis bsnyen par rdzogs pa la bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes pas/ gzhi ma mchis par
310a7('dul ba): 'pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro// bsnyen pa rdzogs pa la bsnyen pa rdzogs par 'du shes pas bzhi
310a8('dul ba): ma mchis par 'pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// bsnyen pa ma rdzogs pa la bsnyen pa ma rdzogs
310b1('dul ba): bar 'du shes pas gzhi ma mchis par 'pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// 6/ btsun pa re shig dge slong //
310b2('dul ba): gis mi'i dge slong la mir 'du shes pas/ gzhi ma mchis par 'pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur
310b3('dul ba): ro// pi la mi lags par 'du shes pas/ gzhi ma mchis par 'jam pa'i chos kyis skur ba btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur/

310b6('dul ba): po mtha' dang mtshams med pa// lhag ma dang ni cig la cig/ bris pa dang ni bag tsam nyid// rgya cher bya ba nyid yin no// btsun pa re shig dge slong bdag
310b7('dul ba): nyid ngas ma tshangs par spyod pa khrig pa las byung ba'i brten to zhes khas len pa de la/ dge slong zhig gis gzhi ma mchis par rku ba 'am/ gsod pa 'am/
310b8('dul ba): rgya bsnyen pa ma rdzogs pa la bsnyen pa ma rdzogs par 'du shes pas gzhi ma mchis par 'pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab ni cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro//
311a1('dul ba): @bla mar gyur pa'i chos smra bas bskur ba btab na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyuraro// rnas btsun pa re shig dge slong bdag
311a2('dul ba): nyid ngas yo byad chen po brkus so zhes khas len pa de la/ dge song zhig gis gzhi ma mchis par gsod pa 'am/ bla mar gyur pa'i chos smra bas 'am/ mi tshangs par
311a3('dul ba): sprod pas bskur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro// btsun pa re shig dge slong bdag nyid ngas mi srog dang bral lo zhes khas len pa de la/ dge
311a4('dul ba): slong zhig gis bzhi ma mchis par bla mar gyur pa'i chos smra ba la/ mi tshangs par spyod pa 'am/ rku bas rkur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyuraro//
311a5('dul ba): btsun pa re shig dge slong bdag nyid ngas mi'i chos bla mar gyur pa smras so zhes khas len pa de la/ dge slong zhig gis gzhi ma mchis par mi tshangs par sprod pa 'am/
311a6('dul ba): rku ba 'am/ srog gcod par skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyuraro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis dge slong la gzhi ma mchis
311a7('dul ba): bar 'pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong la gzhi ma mchis par
311a8('dul ba): 'tsham med par skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ gal te ma dang / pha dang / dgra bcom pa gsod par skur pa btab na/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro//
311b1('dul ba): 'on te gzhi med par dge 'dun gyi dben byed pa dang / ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin par skur pa btab na ni nyes byas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nye ba 'khor gang gis ma dang /
311b2('dul ba): ba dang / dgra bcom pa gsod pa bskur pa 'debs pa des ni/ 'bam pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab pa yin no// gang gis dge 'dun gyis dben byed pa dang / ngan sems kyis khrag
311b3('dul ba): 'byin par skur pa btab pa des ni/ nyes pa sbom por bskur ba btab pa ma yin te/ nyes pa sbom pos ni dge slong ma yin pa'i mi 'gyur gyis/ de ni gshegs par 'os pa
311b4('dul ba): yin no// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong la gzhi ma mchis pa 'pham pa'i chos kyis bskur pa btab pa na/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur na/ gal te gzhi ma mchis
311b5('dul ba): par dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos kyi bskur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags ltung byed du 'gyur ro// gzhi ma mchis par so ros bshegs pa bgyis pa dang / nyes byas kyis skur
311b6('dul ba): ba btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// de bzhin du gzhi ma mchis par nyes pa sbom por bskur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so//
311b7('dul ba): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis dge slong la gzhi med par 'pham pa'i chos kyis bskur ba btab na/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyu ro zhes gsungs pa
311b8('dul ba): gang lags/ btsun pa re shig dge slong gis/ dge slong ma dang / dge tshul dang / dge tshul ma gzhi ma michis par 'pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes
312a1('dul ba): pasgom por 'gyur ro// dge slong mas dge slong ma la gzhi ma mchis par 'bab pa'i chos kyi ba skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag gar
312a2('dul ba): 'gyuraro// dge slong mas dge slong la 'pham pa'i chos kyis bskur ba btab na cir 'gyur lags/ dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ro// dge slob ma dang / dge tshul dang / dge tshul ma
312a3('dul ba): la gzhi ma mchis par 'pham pa'i chos kyis skur pa btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// dge slob mas dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge tshul dang /
312a4('dul ba): dge tshul ma gzhi ma mchis par 'pham pa'i chos kyis bskur ba btab na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so// dge tshul gyis dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge slob ma dang /
312a5('dul ba): dge tshul dang / dge tshul ma la bzhi ma mchis par 'pham pa'i chos kyis bskur ba btab na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// dge tshul mas dge slong dang /

312a7('dul ba): dge slong gis bdag nyid kyis bris nas/ 'di skad ces yi ge 'di las ni/ 'di skad du khyod mi tshangs par spyod pa'i 'pham pa byung zhes zer ro zhes zer ro zhes mchin/ cir 'gyur
312a8('dul ba): lags nyes pa sbom por 'gyur ro// btsun pa dge slong la gzhi ma mchis pas 'pham pa'i chos kyi bskur pa btab kyang / dge 'dun lhag mar mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lag
312b1('dul ba): sa ma/ yod de sngar ltung ba byung ba dang / rku thabs su gnas pa dang / dang po mi mthun pa can dang / ma ning dang / dge slong ma sman phyung ba la ni nyes byas so//
312b2('dul ba): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang thos shig ni sdang bar gyur nos/
312b3('dul ba): nas kyang 'di tshangs par spyod pa dang / bral lo snyam nas/ dge slong dag pa ltung ba med pa la/ gzhan gyi cha dang 'thun pa ma yin pa 'bam par 'gyur ba'i chos kyis/
312b4('dul ba): skur ba btab pa las/ des dus gzhan zhig na/ dris kyang rung ma dris kyang rung / rtsod pa de yang gzhan gyi cha dang 'thun pa ma yin pa yin la/ rtsod pa gzhan gyi cha
312b5('dul ba): dang 'thun pa ma yin pas bag tsam las bsams pa tsam gyis chos 'ga' zhig blangs par 'gyur la/ dge slong yang zhe sdang la gnas pas zhe sdang gis smras so zhe na/
312b6('dul ba): dge 'dun lhag ma'o zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa zhes bya ba ste/ gzhung lhag ma ni gzhi med pa ji lta bzhin du/ bag tsam la rgya cher brjed par bya'o//
312b7('dul ba): sdom la/ ba shes pa dang ni gsol ba dang // gleng ban dang dran pa gnyis// bzhi pa 'dug dang maskos dang // 'dun pas cig dang nam mkha' la/
312b8('dul ba): 'dug par rgyam brjid du// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la me dang ldan pathe ba la tshang gi rgyum bdun pa pamam ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong ga she
313a1('dul ba): 'thun pa dbye ba'i phyir/ rtul bar byed cing dbyen par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung te 'dug na/ dge slong de la dge
313a2('dul ba): slong rnams kyis 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa khyod dge 'dun 'thun pa dbye ba'i phyir rtul bar ma byed cig/ dbyen byed par gyur pa'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs
313a3('dul ba): nas/ rab tu bzung ste ma 'dug shig/ tshe dang ldan pa dge 'dun dang 'thun par gyis shig/ dge 'dun 'thun mi byed kun tu dga' ma rtsod mchog cig 'don
313a4('dul ba): pa gcig cing / chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa lta bur gyur la/ ston pa'i bstan pa bsal bar byed na bde ba la reg par gnas par gyur te/ tshe dang ldan
313a5('dul ba): pa khyod dge 'dun 'byed par byed pa'i gzhi 'di lta bu 'di thong shig ces sgo bar bya'o// dge slong de la dge slong rnams kyis de skad bsgob na gal te gzhi de gtong na
313a6('dul ba): de lta na legs/ gal te mi gtong na gzhi de gtong bar bya ba'i phyir len gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par sgo bar bya/ yang dag par bstan par bya'o// lan
313a7('dul ba): gnyis lan gsum du yang dag par bsgo/ yang dag par bstan pa na/ gzhi de gtong na de ltan legs/ gal te mi gtong na dge 'dun lhag ma'o// zhes
313a8('dul ba): gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa re shig dge slong gis bshes pa'i tshig gis ma bsgo bar gsol ba dang gzhi'i las kyis bsgo bar bgyid na/ bsgo ba zhes
313b1('dul ba): bgyi 'am 'on te ma bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags bka' stsal pa/ ma sgo ba zhes bya'o// bsgo ba 'chags sam/ nye ba 'khor mi 'chags te/ dge 'dun
313b2('dul ba): la yang des 'gal tsha ba can du 'gyur ro// btsun pa bshes pa'i tshig gis bsgo nas gsol ba dang / bzhi las kyis bsgo na bsgo ba zhes bgyi 'am/
313b3('dul ba): 'on te ma sgo ba zhes bgyi lags bka' stsal pa/ bsgo ba 'chags pa lags sam/ nye bar 'khor 'chags te/ dge 'dun la yang 'gal tshab
313b4('dul ba): can du mi 'gyur ro// btsun pa dgrang ba'i las ma bgyis par bshes pa'i tshig gis bsgo bar bgyis na/ bsgo ba zhes bgyi'am/ 'on te ma bsgo/
313b5('dul ba): ba zhes bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ ma bsgo ba zhes bya'o// bsgo ba 'chags lag sam/ nye ba 'khor mi chags te/ dge 'dun la yang 'gal tshab
313b6('dul ba): can du 'gyuraro// btsun pa bslad pa'i las bgyis te/ bshes pa'i tshig gis bsgo bar bgyid na/ bsgo ba zhes bgyi 'am/ 'on te ma bsgo ba zhes
313b7('dul ba): bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ sgo ba zhes bya'o// sgo ba 'chags sam/ nye ba 'khor chags te/ dge 'dun la yang 'gal tshabs can du mi 'gyur ro// btsun
313b8('dul ba): kha bsgo bar bgyid na/ bskrad pa'i las ma bgyis par dge 'dun la 'dun pas 'gro ba'o zhes mchi zhing / zhes sdang gi 'gro ba dang / gti mug
314a1('dul ba): gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba'o zhes mchi na cir 'gyur lags// nyes byas so// bsgo bar bgyi 'am/ 'on te sgo bar mi
314a2('dul ba): bgyid lags/ bka' stsal pa/ sgo bar mi bya'o bsgo ba 'chags pa lags sam/ nye ba 'khor mi chags te/ dge 'dun la yang 'gal tshabs can
314a3('dul ba): 'gyur ro// bskrad pa'i las bgyis nas dge 'dun la 'dun pas 'gro ba'o// zhes mchi zhing zhe sdang gis 'gro ba dang / gti mug gis 'gro ba dang / 'jigs
314a4('dul ba): pas 'gro ba'o zhes mchi na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// bsgo bar bgyi'am 'on te bsgo bar mi bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa sgo bar mi bya'o// bsgo
314a5('dul ba): ba 'chags lags sam/ nye ba 'khor ma chags te/ dge 'dun la yang 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re shig ma glengs dran par ma bgyis par
314a6('dul ba): bdag nyid bka' blo mi bde ba la gnas par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// bsgo bar bgyi 'am/ 'on te bsgo bar mi bgyid lags/ bka' stsal pa/
314a7('dul ba): sgo bar 'chags legs sam/ nye ba 'khor mi 'chags so// btsun pa re shig glengs shing dran par bgyi lags/ bdag nyid bka' blo mi bde ba la gnas par bgyid
314a8('dul ba): na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// bsgo bar bgyi 'am/ 'on te bsgo bar mi bgyid lags/ bka' stsal pa sgo bar bye'o/ bsgo ba 'chags lags sam/
314b1('dul ba): nye bar 'khor chags so// mtshams kyis nang na mchis pa dag gis/ mtshams kyis nang na mchis pa dag gis/ mtshams kyis slad rol na mchis pa la bsgo na bsgo ba
314b2('dul ba): zhes bgyi lags sam/ nye ba 'khor ba yin no// mtshams kyis slad rol na mchis pa dag gis/ mtshams kyis nang na mchis pa dag la sgo na/ bsgo ba zhes bgyi
314b3('dul ba): lags sam/ nye ba 'khor ma yin no// btsun pa re shig dge slong las bgyid pa mtshams kyis nang na mchis pas/ mtshams kyis slad rol na mchis pa dag la bsgo na/
314b4('dul ba): bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags sam/ nye ba 'khor ma yin no// btsun pa re shig dge slong las bgyid pa mtshams kyi slad rol na mchis pas/ mtshams kyis nang na mchis pa/
314b5('dul ba): dag la sgo na/ bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags sam/ nye ba 'khor ma yin no// btsun pa re shig dge slong las bgyid pas mtshams mnan cing / mtshams non par bgyis
314b6('dul ba): te/ mtsham su mtshams nas bsgo na bsgo ba zhes bgyi'am/ ma sgo ba zhes bgyi lags/ nye ba 'khor bsgo ba zhes bya'o// bsgo ba chags lags sam/ nye ba 'khor chag
314b7('dul ba): so// btsun pa dge slong las bgyid par ma bsgos pa zhig gis/ tshams kyis nang na mchis pa'i gang zag bzhi bskrad na/ bskrad pa zhes bgyi lags sam/ nye ba 'khor ma
314b8('dul ba): yino// btsun pa dge slong las bgyid par ma bskos pas/ de mtshams kyis nang na mchis pa'i gang zag bzhi bskrad na/ bskrad pa zhes bgyi lags sam/ gal te des re re dang /
315a1('dul ba): / gnyis gnyis dang / gsum gsum nas bskrad kyi bzhir ma yin na duskrad pa zhes bya'o// btsun pa dge slong las bgyid na tshams kyi nang phyogs bzhin/
315a2('dul ba): mtshungs par gnas pa'i dge slong mchis pa dag gis/ dge slong bzhi zhig la sgo na/ bsgo bar yang chud la ltung ba yang gang du yang mi 'gyur zhing des dge 'dun mi 'thun
315a3('dul ba): par yang mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye ba 'khor gal te phan tshan 'dun pa byin pas/ re re dang / gnyis gnyis dang / gsum gsum la sgo'i gzhi la ma
315a4('dul ba): yin na yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshogs kyi tshogs kyi las dag byar mi rung bas so// las bgyid pa phyogs cig na mchis pas gnas bzhi'i las thams cad
315a5('dul ba): bgyid du rung lags sam/ nye ba 'khor 'di ltar dge slong las byed pas gnas bzhi'i car gyi mtshams kyi mdo// khri 'am khri'u 'am/ re lde 'am/ re lde ldong rings
315a6('dul ba): mnan te 'dug par gyur la/ gnas de dag na yang las 'di lta bu 'di lta ste/ bzhi'i tshogs kyis bya ba'i las dang / lnga'i tshogs kyi bya ba'i las dang / bcu'i tshogs kyis bya ba'i
315a7('dul ba): las dang / nya shu'i tshogs kyis bya ba'i las/ nye bar gnas par gyur na rung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de de dag kha cig gis ni las byed pa yin la/ kha cig gis ni
315a8('dul ba): tshogs skong ba yin no// sa la ma mchis pas na mkha' la mchis pa rnams la sgo na/ bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags sam/ nye bar 'khor ma yin no// btsun pa re shig las bgyid
315b1('dul ba): pa na mkha' la mchis la/ sa la mchis pa rnams la bsgo na bsgo ba zhes bgyi lags sam/ nye ba 'khor ma yin no// ji ltar dge slong la dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyur ba ji
315b2('dul ba): ltar ba de bzhin du/ bslab pa byin pa dang / dge slong ma la yang dge 'dun lhag mar 'gyuraro// dge slob ma dang / dge tshul dang / dge tshul ma rnams la ni nyes bya'o//
315b3('dul ba): sngang ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la yang nyes byas kho na ste/ snga ma yin no// de ltar na gzhang 'di ni dge 'dun lhag ma gsum pa la yang / ci rigs par brjod par
315b4('dul ba): bya ba yin no// // nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa kha che ba las/ dge 'dun lhag ma rdzogs s+ho// @#sdom la/ mtha' dang lam dang rgyal rigs dang // phung
315b5('dul ba): po de bzhin lhag ma dang / phung po de bzhin lhag ma dbye// kha dang sha kha ra dang hwags// bu ma mar gsar ma des gnyis// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
315b6('dul ba): ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhes pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong bud med kyis yul dang lhan cig gcig bu cig dang dben pa skyabs yod pa na/ 'dod
315b7('dul ba): 'dod pa byar rung bar stan la 'dug par byed cing / de la gal te dge bsnyen ma de yis che ba'i tshig dang ldan pas/ chos gsum po 'jam par 'gyur ba 'am/ ltung
315b8('dul ba): byed las gang yang rung bas smras par gyur la/ dge slong gis 'dug par khas blangs na chos gsum po 'pham par 'gyur ba 'am/ dge 'dun lhag ma 'am/ ltung byed
316a1('dul ba): las gang yang rung bas byed du gzhag cing / dge slong de la/ dge snyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pas/ chos gang dang gang gis smras par
316a2('dul ba): gyur pa'i chos de dang des dge slong de byed du gzhag ste/ de ni ma nges pa'i chos so// yang dge slong gang bud med kyis yul dang lhan cig cig pu gcig dang dben pa
316a3('dul ba): skyabs yod pa na/ 'dod par byar mi rung bar stan la 'dug par byed cing / de la gal te dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pas/ chos gnyis po dge
316a4('dul ba): 'dun lhag ma 'am/ ltung byed las chos gang yang rung bas smras par gyur la dge slong gis 'dug par khas blangs na/ chos gnyis po dge 'dun lhag ma 'am/
316a5('dul ba): ltung byed las chos gang yang rung bas byed du gzhug cing / dge slong la/ dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pas/ chos gang gis smras par gyur pa'i
316a6('dul ba): chos de dang des dge slong de byed du gzhug ste/ de yang ma nges pa'i chos so zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa re shig dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig
316a7('dul ba): dang ldan pa zhig gis dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas 'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong mtha' dang po 'byin par bgyid pa mthong ngo zhes mchi na/
316a8('dul ba): dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/ byed du mi bzhug go/ de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du rtsal tam/ mi gzhug ste/ re shig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga'
316b1('dul ba): yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te 'di skad ces yod zhes na/ gnyis la dri bar bya ste/ gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i
316b2('dul ba): tshig gis byed du bzhug cing / de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go// 'on te 'di skad ces 'di mtha' dang po ni ma byung mod kyi 'on kyang bdag gis mtha' gnyis
316b3('dul ba): dang / gsum dang bzhi pa byung ba mthong ngo zhes zer na dge slong la rmad du gzhug go// dang po ji lta bar mtha' gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa rnams
316b4('dul ba): la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o// btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig/ dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas/ 'di skad ces
316b5('dul ba): btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig gis kha'i lam du nyams par bgyid pa mthong ngo zhes mchis na/ dge slon ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig
316b6('dul ba): gis bgyid du sbrul tam/ byed du mi bzhug go// de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal tam/ mi bzhug ste/ re shig de la che zhes zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o// /
316b7('dul ba): gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na gnyi ga la dri bar bya ste/ gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du bzhug cing /
316b8('dul ba): de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go// 'on te de 'di skad ces 'das kha'i lam du na nyams par mi byas te/ 'on kyang bshang ba'i lam dang / gci bo'i lam
317a1('dul ba): nyams par byas so zhes zer na dge slong la rmad du gzhug go// kha'i lam du ji ltar bshang ba'i lam dang bci ba'i lam du yang de bzhin du
317a2('dul ba): brjod par bya'o// btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig/ dge slong rnams kyis drung du mchis nas 'di skad ces/ btsun pa dag dge slong zhig/
317a3('dul ba): rgyal rigs ma zhig dang lhan cig tu nyams par bgyid pa bdag gis mthong ngo zhes mchis na/ dge snyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/
317a4('dul ba): byed du mi bzhug go/ de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal tam/ mi bzhag ste/ re shig de la de la de na che zhes zla ba 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te de 'di skad
317a5('dul ba): ces yod do zhes zer na gnyi ga la dri bar bya ste/ gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhag cing / de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol
317a6('dul ba): du gzhug go// 'on te de 'di skad ces rgyal rigs dang lhan cig tu nyams par na ma byas na/ 'on kyang bram ze mo dang lhan cig tu nyams par 'gyur to zhes zer na/ dge
317a7('dul ba): spong la rmad du gzhug go// rgyal rigs mo dang ji lta bar bram ze mo dang / rdo'i rigs mo dang / blangs rigs mo dang / dkar mo dang / sngon po dang / sngo bsang mo dang /
317a8('dul ba): thung du ma dang / sdug gu ma dang / skye ma mo dang / tshon mo dang / lus ran pa dang / 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa dang / 'greng ba dang / 'gyel ba dang / yang rgyas par brjod
317b1('dul ba): bar bya'o// btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas/ 'di skad ces btsun pa dag gis dge slong zhig mtha'
317b2('dul ba): dang po zhig phung po'i 'byin par bgyid pa mthong ngo zhes mchis na/ dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/ byed du mi gzhug go// de de'i
317b3('dul ba): ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal tam/ mi bzhag te re shig de la che zhes zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na/ gnyi ga la dri bar bya
317b4('dul ba): ste/ gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing / de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go// 'on te 'di skad ces
317b5('dul ba): mtha' dang po'i phung po ni ma byung gis 'on kyang ltung ba'i phung po gnyis po gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa dang / lnga la byung ngo zhes bya ba rgyas par brjod// /
317b6('dul ba): btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig dge slong rnams kyis drung du mchis na/ 'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig dge 'dun
317b7('dul ba): lhag ma dang po 'byin par bgyid pa mthong ngo zhes mchis na/ dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa shig bgyid du sprul tam/ byed du mi bzhag go// de
317b8('dul ba): de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal tam/ ma gzhug ste/ re shig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te 'di skad ces zer na/ gnyi ga la 'dra
318a1('dul ba): bar bya ste/ gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du bzhug cing / de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol gzhug go// 'on
318a2('dul ba): te de 'di skad ces dge 'dun lhag ma dang po ni ma byung gi 'on kyang dge 'dun lhag ma gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang bzhi pa nas bcu gsum pa'i bar byung ngo zhes
318a3('dul ba): zer na/ dge slong ma rmad du gzhug go// dang po la ji ltar bar dge 'dun lhag ma gnyis pa dang / gsum pa nas bcu gsum pa'i bar la yang de bzhin du brjod
318a4('dul ba): par bya'o// btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pas/ dge slong rnams kyis drung du mchis nas/ 'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong
318a5('dul ba): shig gis khar nyams par bgyid pa mthong ngo zhes mchi na/ dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/ byed du mi gzhag go//
318a6('dul ba): de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du stsal tam/ mi gzhug ste/ re shig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes dri bar
318a7('dul ba): bya'o// gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na/ gnyi ga la dri bar bya ste/ gal te 'thun na dge bsnyen
318a8('dul ba): ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing / de de'i rang bzhin tshol du gzhugaso// 'on te 'di skad ces khar ni nyams par ma byas kyis
318b1('dul ba): 'on kyang 'dis so'i phyi rol mchu'i nang du kha ba phyung ngo // zhes zer na/ dge slong la rmad du gzhug go// btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang
318b2('dul ba): ldan pa zhig dge slong rnams kyi drung du mchis nas 'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis/ dge slong zhig gis gci ba'i lam du nyams par bgyid pa mthong ngo //
318b3('dul ba): zhes mchis na/ dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid tu stsal tam/ byed du bzhag go/ de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol stsal tam/ mi gzhag te/ re
318b4('dul ba): shig de la de na che zhes zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na/ gnyi ga la dri bar bya ste/ gal te 'thun na dge bsnyen ma yid
318b5('dul ba): ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing / de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go// 'on te 'di skad ces gci ba'i lam du ni nyams par ma byas kyis/
318b6('dul ba): 'on kyang 'dis zla phrag du khu ba phyung ngo zhes zer na/ dge slong la rmad du gzhug go// btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan gzhag/ dge slong rnams kyi
318b7('dul ba): drung du mchis nas 'di skad ces/ btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig gis bshad pa'i lam du nyams par bgyid pa mthong ngo zhes mchis na/ dge bsnyen
318b8('dul ba): mi yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis 'gyur du stsal tam/ byed du mi gzhug go// de de'i ngo bo nyid tshel du stsal tam/ mi gzhug ste// re shig de la ren
319a1('dul ba): che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhi bar bya'o// gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na gnyi ga la dri bar bya ste/ gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches
319a2('dul ba): pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing / de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go// 'on te 'di skad ces bshang ba'i lam du ni nyams par ma byas kyis/ 'on
319a3('dul ba): kyang 'dis rkub rtsos kyi phrag tu khu ba phyung ngo zhes zer na/ dge slong la rmed du bzhug go/ btsun pa dge slong ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig dge slong ma rnam
319a4('dul ba): kyi drung du mchis nas 'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig dus yin par skyo ma 'thung ba mthong ngo // zhes mchi na/ dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i
319a5('dul ba): tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/ byed du mi gzhug/ de de'i ngo bo nyid stsal tam/ mi gzhug te/ re shig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod de ma zhes
319a6('dul ba): dri bar bya'o// gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na gnyi ga la dri bar bya ste// gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i gis byed du bzhag
319a7('dul ba): cing / de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du bzhug go// 'on te de 'di skad ces dus ma yin par sgrom ni ma mthungs kyi/ 'on kyang 'dis sha kha ra'i chu 'thungs so// zhes zer na/ dge slong
319a8('dul ba): la rmad du gzhug go// btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i zhig dge slong rnams kyis drung du mchis nas/ 'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis
319b1('dul ba): dge slong zhig bu ram chang 'thungs so// zhes mchis na/ dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/ byed du mi gzhug go/ de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol
319b2('dul ba): du stsal tam/ ma gzhug ste/ re shig de la de la de na che zhes zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na gnyi ga la dri bya
319b3('dul ba): ste/ gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du bzhag cing / de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du gzhug go/ 'on te 'di skad ces
319b4('dul ba): 'dis dus ma yin par bu ram kyi chang ma mthungs kyi/ 'on kyang 'dis hwags kyi chu 'thungs so zhes zer na/ dge slong rmad du gzhag go/ btsun pa dge bsnyen ma
319b5('dul ba): yid pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig/ dge slong rnams kyis drung du mchis nas/ 'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig gis dus ma yin par sha za bar mthong
319b6('dul ba): ngo zhes mchis na/ dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig gis bgyid du bskul tam/ byed du mi bzhug go/ de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du bskul tam/ mi gzhug ste/ re shig
319b7('dul ba): de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri bar bya'o// gal te 'di skad ces yod do zer na gnyi ga la dri bar bya'o// gal te mthun na dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig
319b8('dul ba): dang ldan pa'i tshig gis byed du gzhug cing / de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du bzhug go// 'on te de 'di skad ces dus ma yin par sha ni ma zos kyis/ 'on kyang 'dis bu ram zhig
320a1('dul ba): zos so zhes zer nas/ dge slong la rmad du bzhug go// btsun pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa zhig dge slong rnams kyis drung
320a2('dul ba): na mchis na/ 'di skad ces btsun pa dag bdag gis dge slong zhig du ma lags par kha zas za ba mthong ngo zhes mchi na/ dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan
320a3('dul ba): pa'i tshig gis bgyid du stsal tam/ byed du mi bzhug go// de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du bstsal tam ma bzhug ste/ re shig de la de na che zhe zla 'ga' yod dam zhes dri/
320a4('dul ba): bar bya'o// gal te 'di skad ces yod do zhes zer na/ gnyi ga la dri bar bya ste/ gal te mdun na/ dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa'i tshig gis
320a5('dul ba): byed du bzhug cing / de de'i ngo bo nyid tshol du bzhug go/ 'on te 'di skad ces dus ma yin pa'i zas ni ma zos kyi/ 'on kyang 'dis mar zos so zhes zer na/ dge
320a6('dul ba): slong la rmad du gzhug go/ de lta bu dngos po ma nges pa dge bsnyen ma yid ches pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ dben pa mthong ba smra ba gang dag yin pa de dag la/ dge
320a7('dul ba): slong la rmad du bzhug go// nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa kha ches pa las nges pa dang ldan pa rdzogs s+ho// // sdom la/ de nyid stor dang tshig pa dang // sems khrugs
320a8('dul ba): byin gyi ma brlab dang // rung ba dang ni dus las 'das// mtshan dang gzhi dang bting ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhwag
320b1('dul ba): btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong chos gos zin pas chos gos sra brkyang byung nas zhag bcu'i bar du gos lhag par rung bar ma byas par bcad par bya'o//
320b2('dul ba): de las 'das par bcas na spang ba'i ltung byed do// zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa btsun pa chos gos de nyid dgung bcu 'das pa yang lags la/ de nyid dgung cig
320b3('dul ba): bral yang lags pa lhag mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod do// 'di ltar dge slong gis zhag bcu 'das pa'i chos gos byin gyis brlabs nas/ chos gos med
320b4('dul ba): bar tshams kyis phyi rol tu skya reng 'char bar byed na chos gos 'di ni zhag bcu 'das pa yang yin la/ zhag cig bral ba yang yin no// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis spang ba'i
320b5('dul ba): chos gos nyams par gyur na/ ltung ba bshags par bgyi 'am/ nye bar 'khor 'ba' shig pa'i bshegs par bya'o// gal te ldang ba bshags pa lags nas/ slar rnyed
320b6('dul ba): na spang bar bgyi 'am/ nye bar 'khor ma yin no// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis spang ba'i chos gos mes tshig gam/ zos par gyur na dum bu de dag spang bar bgyid
320b7('dul ba): lags sam/ nye bar 'khor ma yin te 'ba' shig pa'i ltung ba bshags par bya'o// 'on te kun nas khru gang ba zhig yin na spang bar bya'o// btsun pa re shig dge
320b8('dul ba): slong gis chos gos rnyed nas/ dgung lnga lon pa dang / sems 'khrug par gyur gang nas bzung ste/ de'i dgung bcu bgrang bar bgyi lags/ gang nas bzung ste rang gis
321a1('dul ba): sems phyir rnyed pa nas so// btsun pa dge slong gis chos gos brgyad dam dgu zhig byin gyis ma brlabs/ rung bar ma bgyis par nam 'tshe'i bar du
321a2('dul ba): bcangs na nongs par mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye ba 'khor yod do// 'di ltar dge slong gis nyi ma re re zhing chos gos las phyung ste gzhan gyi byin gyis brlob
321a3('dul ba): na'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zhag bcu las 'das pa'i chos gos spang ba'o// zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa btsun pa dge slong gis chos gos lhag ma pa
321a4('dul ba): dgung bcu las 'das par bcangs kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye ba 'khor yod do// 'di ltar gos kyis spu na rung bar gyur la/ rgyu
321a5('dul ba): mi rung bar gyur pa dang / rgyu rung bar gyur la spun mi rung bar gyur pa dang / gnyi ga mi rung bar gyur te/ mi rung ba ni rnga bal dang / ba lang gi spu dang / ra bal dang / ra
321a6('dul ba): dgas kyi bal dang 'dres pa dang / tha gsum brtags pa ste/ de lta bu'i chos gos zhag bcu las lhag par bcang na nyes bya su 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'ang
321a7('dul ba): kyis dge slong rnams kyis zhag bcu'i bar du gos lhag par bcang bar bya'o// zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa dge slong gis nam tsho'i bar du chos gos
321a8('dul ba): lhag pa bcangs kying nongs par mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod do// zhag bcu tshun chad du dus las 'das par gyur na'o// btsun pa chos gos de nyi
321b1('dul ba): bcangs na/ ltung bar yang mi 'gyur la/ chos gos de nyid bcangs na ltung bar yang 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye ba 'khor yod de/ 'di ltar dge slong
321b2('dul ba): de chos gos rin po che 'chang na ltung ba med la/ mtshan gyur ste dge slong mar red de 'chang na ltung bar 'gyur ro// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis chos gos rnyed nas
321b3('dul ba): dgung bcu lags pa dang / de'i mtshan gyur te dge slong mar reng nas dgung bcu 'das na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed 'gyur ro// btsun pa re shig dge
321b4('dul ba): slong mas chos gos zhig snyed nas dgung bcu lags pa dang / mtshan gyur te/ dge slong du red nas dgung bcu 'das na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// /
321b5('dul ba): btsun pa re shig dge slong dgung bcur 'du shes te skya reng 'gyed na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dgung bcu la dgu bcu ma lags par 'du shes
321b6('dul ba): na cir 'gyur lags ltung ba med do// dgung bcu ma lags pa la dgung bcur 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas su 'gyur ro// dgung ma lags pa la dgu
321b7('dul ba): bcu ma lags par 'du shes na cir lags ltung ba med do// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis sra brkyang bting gnas su chos gos zhig rnyed la chos gos de yang spang
321b8('dul ba): bar 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod do// 'di ltar dge slong gis chos gos spang ba yin la/ dge slong des kyang chos gos de la spangs bral bar
322a1('dul ba): mi byas/ nyes pa ma bshags par gyur pa'i skabasu dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang bting bar gyur la/ sra brkyang bting nas dge slong chos gos gzhan
322a2('dul ba): zhig rnyed na'o// btsun pa re shig brlab bstsal pas dgung bcu las lhag par chos gos lhag pa bcangs na/ cir 'gyur lags spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//
322a3('dul ba): btsun pa re shig dge slong mas dgung bcu lhag par chos gos lhag pa bcangs na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slob ma dang / dge
322a4('dul ba): tshul dang / dge tshul mas dgung bcu las 'das par chos lhag par bcangs na cir 'gyur lags ltung ba med do// sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes
322a5('dul ba): byas te/ snga ma bzhin no// sdom la dge 'dun gyis dang sa dang mtshams/ ma nan dang ni ma gnang dang // mtshams ma bcad dang ma g.yogs dang // gzhi tshan
322a6('dul ba): dang ni de bzhin mtshan// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong chos gos
322a7('dul ba): zin pas sra brkyang phyung na gal te nub cig kyang chos gos gsum las/ chos gos gang yang rung ba dang / mtshams kyis phyi rol tu 'bral bar byed na/ dge
322a8('dul ba): 'dun gyis gnang ba ma brtogs te/ spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa btsun pa dge 'dun gyis chos gos byin gyis brlab par gnang lags sam nye
322b1('dul ba): par 'khor mi gnang ngo // btsun pa de lta bu'i rkyen zhig mchis na gnang lags sam/ nye ba 'khor gnang ngo // btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge 'dun gyis
322b2('dul ba): chos gos byin gyis brlabs te/ chos gos ma mchis par mtshams kyis slad rol tu bral bar bgyid la/ chos gos dang bral ba zhe bgyi las/ chos gos dang ma
322b3('dul ba): bral ba zhes bgyis lags/ bka' stsal pa/ chos gos de spang bar bgyi lags sam nye bar 'khor ma yin te/ 'ba' zhig pa'i ltung byed bshegs par bya'o// /
322b4('dul ba): btsun pa dge slong gis chos gos sa la bzhag ste/ nam mkha' la skya reng 'char bar bgyid dam/ chos gos na mkha' la bzhag ste/ sa la 'char bar bgyid na chos
322b5('dul ba): gos dang bral ba zhes bgyi 'am/ chos gos dang mabral ba zhes bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa chos gos dang bral ba zhes bya'o// btsun pa re shig dge slong chos gos mtshams kyi
322b6('dul ba): nang du bzhag ste/ mtshams kyis slad rol tu skya rengs 'tshar bar bgyid dam/ chos gos mtshams kyis slad rol tu bzhag ste/ mtshams kyis nang du skya reng 'char bar bgyid nam/ chos
322b7('dul ba): gos dang bral bar zhes bgyi 'am/ chos gos dang ma bral ba zhes bgyi lags/ bka' stsal pa/ chos gos dang bral ba zhes bya'o// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis mtshams gnan
322b8('dul ba): tam/ mtshams bzung nas/ mtsham su 'greng ngam/ mchis te mchis kyi bar du chos gos gzhag nas skya reng 'char bar bgyid na chos gos dang bral ba zhes bgyi'/
323a1('dul ba): chos gos dang ma bral ba zhes bgyi lags/ bka' sprul pa chos gos dang ma bral ba zhes bya'o// btsun pa dge slong yang mtsham/
323a2('dul ba): kyis nang na mchis la/ chos gos kyang mtshams kyis nang na mchis pas/ chos gos dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye ba 'khor yod
323a3('dul ba): de mtshams gcad par byas pas chos gos dang mi bral ba'i sdom pa ma yin na'o// btsun pa re shig mtshams ma bcad pa'i gnas su gang tshun chad dge
323a4('dul ba): slong chos gos dang ma bral ba zhes bgyi/ nye ba 'khor ji tsam du gtsug lag khang gis nye ba 'khor chab kung sa 'am/ sgo khyams 'am/ khang bran nam/
323a5('dul ba): kun dga' ra ba 'am/ dge slong gis kun tu spyad pa 'am/ ra ba 'am/ grong ngam 'obs yod pa'o// btsun pa dge slong yang gnas cig la stengs g.yog
323a6('dul ba): kyang gnas pa gcig pa zhig na mchis la/ de nyid na chos gos kyang mchis na/ chos gos dang bral bar 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye ba 'khor yed
323a7('dul ba): de/ 'di ltar gnas de mu stegs can sna tshogs dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / spyod pa pa dang / kun tu rgyu rnams sam/ spun nor bgos pa rnams kyis yin
323a8('dul ba): na'o// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis mtshams kyi slad rol na mtshams kyis slad rol tu 'du shes pas/ skye rang 'char bar bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/
323b1('dul ba): spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// mtshams kyis nang la mtshams kyis slad du 'du shes na/ cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so// mtshams kyis slad rol na/ mtshams kyi
323b2('dul ba): nang na 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do// mtshams kyi nang la mtshams nang du 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do// btsun pa re shig dge slong
323b3('dul ba): gis mtshams nang du chos gos bzhag ste/ mtshams kyis slad rol tu skya rengs shar bar bgyis pa las/ mtshan gyur te dge slong mar reng na cir 'gyur lags/ spang
323b4('dul ba): pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re shig dge slong ma zhig gis/ mtshams kyis nang du chos gos bzhag ste/ mtshams kyi slad rol tu skya reng 'char bar bgyid pa las
323b5('dul ba): mtshan gyur te/ dge slong du rad na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa dge slong gis gang gis mdun du chos gos byin gyi brlab par bgyi/ nye ba
323b6('dul ba): 'khor dge slong gis ni dge slong gi mdun du chos gos byin gyi brlab par bya'o// btsun pa dge slong mas gang gis mdun dus chos gos byin gyi brlab par bgyi/ nye bar
323b7('dul ba): 'khor dge slong mas ni dge slong ma'i mdun du chos gos byin gyi brlab par bya ste/ dbyung ba dang rung bar bya ba yang de bzhin du bya'o// btsun pa re shig dge slong ba stsal pa chos
323b8('dul ba): gos ma mchis par mtshams kyis slad rol du skya reng du 'char bar bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur te de bzhin du dge slong ma la ni chos gos lngas
324a1('dul ba): spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slong ma dang / dge tshul dang / dge tshul ma rnams la ni nyes pa med do// sngar ltung ba la sogs
324a2('dul ba): ba la ni nyes byas te/ snga ma bzhin no// // sdom la/ sems 'khrugs pa dang dus las 'das/ de bzhin rung ba nyid dang ni// mi rung ba dang gi dang ba
324a3('dul ba): dang // tshad dang gzhi tshan dag dang mtshan// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
324a4('dul ba): kyis/ dge slong chos gos zin pas chos gos sra brkyang phyung nas/ dus ma yin pa'i gos rnyed la 'dod na/ dge slong des chos gos de blang bar bya'o//
324a5('dul ba): blang nas gal te langs na myur du kho nar chos gos su byas te bcang bar bya'o// gal te mi langs la kha na langs pa kha bskor ba'i chos gos la re ba yod
324a6('dul ba): na yang / dge slong des chos gos de zla ba cig gis bar du bzhag par bya'o// de las 'das par 'jog na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa
324a7('dul ba): gang lags pa/ btsun pa re shig dge slong gis chos gos shig rnyed ma thag tu/ sems 'khrugs par gyur na/ gang nas bzung ste de'i zla ba bgrang ba bgyi/
324a8('dul ba): gang nas bzung ste rang gi sems phyir rnyed pa nas so// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong gis zla ba gcig gi bar du chos bzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs
324b1('dul ba): pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa dge slong gis namatsho'i bar du chos gos gang bzhag kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye ba 'khor yod de/ zla ba
324b2('dul ba): gcig tshun chad du dus byas byas na'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ma/ dge slong gis chos gos zla ba cig gis bar du bzhag par bya'o// zhes gsungs pa gang
324b3('dul ba): lags pa chos gos de ji lta bu lags/ bdun po dag las brtag pa gang yang rung ba ngas rjes su gnang zhing ma bkag pa gang yin pa'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
324b4('dul ba): kyis/ dge slong gi chos gos zla ba cig gi bar du bzhag par bya'o// zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa btsun pa dge slong gi dgung zla cig las lhag par bzhag kyang
324b5('dul ba): spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye ba 'khor yod de/ de 'di ltar chos gos kyis spun rung bar gyur la/ rgyu mi rung bar gyur pa dang /
324b6('dul ba): spun mi rung bar gyur pa dang / rgyu rgyu rung bar gyur pa dang / gnyi ga ma rung bar gyur ste/ mi rung ba ni rnga bal dang / ba lang gis spu dang / ri dgas kyis bal dang / ra ba la
324b7('dul ba): dang 'dres pa dang thag su ma rtags te/ de lta bu'i chos gos ni zla ba cig las lhag par gzhag kyang nyes byas su 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge
324b8('dul ba): slong gis chos gos de zla ba gcig gi bar du bzhag par bya'o// zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa dge slong gis dgung zla ba drug du chos gos bzhag kyang
325a1('dul ba): ltung bar mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam nye ba 'khor yod de/ chos gos de rnyed nas/ zhag sum bcu lon pa dang / dge 'dun gyis sra brkyang
325a2('dul ba): bting bar gyur na'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos gsum du/ ma tshang na zla ba gcig gi bar du bzhag go zhes gsungs pa gang legs pa/ btsun pa
325a3('dul ba): dge slong gang chos gos gsum 'chang bar gyur pa des/ chos gos mi langs pa zhig rnyed na/ des kyang dgung zla ba cig gi bar du bzhag par bgyi lags sam/ nye ba
325a4('dul ba): 'khor ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nye ba 'khor chos gos gsum 'ching na/ chos gos gzhan rnyed pa gang yin pa ni langs kyang rung mi langs kyang rung ste/ de
325a5('dul ba): thams cad ni zhag bcu pa yin no// chos gos gsum du ma tshangs pa las gal te chos gos su langs pa zhag rnyed na/ de yang zhag bcu pa yin no// 'on te ma langs
325a6('dul ba): pa zhig rnyed na zla ba cig gis bar du bzhag par bya'o// de las 'das par bzhag na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyuraro// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dgung zla gcig la dgung

325a8('dul ba): cir 'gyur lags ltung ba med do// dgung zla gcig ma lags pa la dgung zla cig tu 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so// dgung zla cig ma lags pa la dgung zla
325b1('dul ba): cig ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis chos gos rnyed nas/ dgung zla gcig lags pa las mtshan/

325b3('dul ba): gos rnyed nas dgung zla cig lags pa dang mtshan gyur te dge slong du rnyed nas dgung zla cig las 'da' bar bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//
325b4('dul ba): btsun pa re shig bslab pa srul pA/ chos gos dgung zla cig pas/ ring du bzhag na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re shig dge slong

325b7('dul ba): rnyed 'dogs rgyud pa dang // sgron ma dang ni sems 'khrugs dang // tshor ba 'on ma glen ma dang // khyim pa mo la stsogs pa ste// bslab pa byin pa tha ma'o// // sangs rgyas
325b8('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ yang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la chos gos rnying pa 'khrur 'jug gam/
326a1('dul ba): 'ched du 'jug gam 'chag tu 'jug na/ spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa re shig dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma lag
326a2('dul ba): ba la/ pho nyas gos snying pa khrur tsal na cir 'gyur lags/ nye byas so// de bzhin du yi ge dang / lag brda' dang / gzhan la snyed 'dogs pa dang / brgyud de dge
326a3('dul ba): slong lags pa la/ chos gos rnying pa 'khrur 'jug na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa sgron ma la gos snying

326a6('dul ba): bsnol na cir 'gyur lags nyes so// de bzhin du dge slong ma tha dad du gnas pa dang / dge slong mkhas len pa dang / ma ning mo dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang /

326b4('dul ba): slong ma na tha ma yin// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la gos brling pa bsgrub par bgyi ba zhig 'khrur bstsol na cir 'gyur lags/

326b7('dul ba): su spyad de/ dri ma can du gyur pa zhig na/ nyes byas su 'gyur ro// 'on te gnas mal gyi dngos po zhig khrur bcug na ni cang ltung ba med do// btsun pa re shig
326b8('dul ba): dge slong ma nye du lags pa la/ chos gos rnying pa 'khrur bskul ba las/ mtshan gyur te dge slong mar red na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so// btsun pa re shig dge slong
327a1('dul ba): la chos gos rnying pa 'khrur bstsol pa las/ mtshan gyur te/ dge slong du red na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis nye/

327a3('dul ba): slong ma nye du ma lags pa lags pa chos gos rnying pa 'khrur bstsal kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye ba 'khor yod de/ 'di ltar
327a4('dul ba): chos gos de'i spun du rung bar gyur la/ rgyu mi rung bar gyur pa dang / rgyu rung bar gyur la/ spun mi rung ba dang / gnyi ga mi rung bar gyur pa ste/ mi rung ba ni rnga bal dang / ba
327a5('dul ba): lang gis spu dang / ri dgas kyis bal dang / ra bal dang / 'dres pa dang / mi bstags pa'o// de lta bu'i chos gos 'khrul bskul na cir 'gyur lags nyes
327a6('dul ba): byas so// btsun pa re shig dge slong chos gos snying pa spang ba zhig dge slong ma nyes du ma lags pa la 'khrur bsnol na cir 'gyur lags/ gal te ma spangs
327a7('dul ba): ba zhig 'khrur 'jug na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// 'on te spangs pa zhig 'jug na nyes byas su 'gyur ro// btsun pa re shig dge slong ma nye du ma lag
327a8('dul ba): kha gzhan gyi chos gos sting pa bstsal na cir 'gyur lags/ gal te ma spangs zhig 'khrur 'jug na spang ba'i ltung bar byed du 'gyur ro// 'on te spangs
327b1('dul ba): bzhig 'khrur 'jug na nyes byas su 'gyur ro// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma nyi du ma lags pa la gnas kyis chos gos snying ba 'gyur/ baphrul nas/

327b3('dul ba): ltar dge slong khyim du zhugs pa'i chos gos gshang ba 'am/ gci ba'am/ 'dam snga ba 'am/ ldan ljin nam/ mi gtsang ba gzhan gyis 'bags par gyur na'o//
327b4('dul ba): des de dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la 'khrur btsol na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// bsnyen pa ma rdzogs par 'khrur bstsol pa'i sbyor ba
327b5('dul ba): bgyis la/ bsnyen pa ma rdzogs par lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags nyes bya'o// bsnyen pa rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyen par rdzogs kar lag
327b6('dul ba): par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so// bsnyen pa rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags nyes byaso// bsnyen
327b7('dul ba): par rdzogs kar legs par bgyis la cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so// bsnyen par rdzogs kar sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas legs par bgyis na cir 'gyur
327b8('dul ba): lags/ nyes byas so// bsnyen par rdzogs nas sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyen pa rdzogs te lags par bgyid na cir 'gyur lags/ spangs pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// bsnyen
328a1('dul ba): / par rdzogs nas sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsten par ma rdzogs par lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge/
328a2('dul ba): slong mnye du ma lags pa/ bsnyen pa rdzogs pa la bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes pas/ chos gos snying pa khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro//
328a3('dul ba): dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa bsnyen pa rdzogs la/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// nye du ma lags pa bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la/ bsnyen
328a4('dul ba): pa rdzogs par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so// nye du ma lags pa bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la/ bsnyen par rdzogs par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// /
328a5('dul ba): btsun pa re shig dge slong gis/ dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la/ nye du ma lags par 'du shes pas chos gos rnying pa 'khrur stsol na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du
328a6('dul ba): 'gyur ro// dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la nye dur 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags ltung ba med do// dge slong ma nye du la nye ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so//
328a7('dul ba): dge slong ma nye du lags pa la/ nye dur 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la/ chos gos
328a8('dul ba): rnying pa 'khrur 'jug na/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyu ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ dge slob ma dang / dge tshul dang / khyim pa mo dang / gzhan mu stegs can dang / dge sbyong
328b1('dul ba): dang / zam ze dang / spyod ba pa dang / kun tu rgyurnams 'khrung bgrol na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so// de bzhin du 'gro ba gzhan du gnas pa la 'khrur brtsom na cir 'thung
328b2('dul ba): lags nyes byas so// dge slong mas dge slong dang / dge tshul dang / gzhan du stegs can dang / dge sbyong dang / zam ze dang / skyong ba dang ku tu dang / 'grob
328b3('dul ba): gzhan du gnas pa rnams la 'khrur/ bsgol na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// khyim pa dang / khyim pa mo la 'khrur bstsol na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so// dge slong
328b4('dul ba): ma dang / dge tshul ma la ni nyes byas so// sngar ltung ba byung ba la sogs pa la ni nyes byas te snga ma bzhin no// de bzhin du 'chang ba dang 'chag pa la yang rgyas par brjod pa/
328b5('dul ba): bya'o// // sdom la/ pho nya yi ge lag rda' dang // gzhan la snyed 'dogs rgyud pa dang // snyon ma dang ni sems 'khrugs dang // tshor ba 'on ma glen ma dang // gnyid
328b6('dul ba): logs ra ro rab myos dang // snyoms zhugs de bzhin 'gro ba dang / khas len 'don pa la stsogs pa// bslab pa byin pa tha ma'o// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
328b7('dul ba): ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang / dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa las/ chos gos len na rjes pa mi rtogs te/ spang
328b8('dul ba): kha'i ltung byed do// zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la/ pho nya las chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lag
329a1('dul ba): nyes byas so// chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas kho na'o// de bzhin du yi ge dang / lags brta dang / gzhin la snyad 'dogs/
329a2('dul ba): pa dang / brgyud pas nyes du ma lags pa'i dge slong ma de la chos gos lan na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye
329a3('dul ba): du ma lags pa ston ma la chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so// tshes gos thob na cir 'gyur lags nyes khro na'o// de bzhin du sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor
329a4('dul ba): khas nyim thag pa dang / glen ma dang / 'on ma dang / gnyid log pa dang / phyag las khom pa dang / rab tu myos pa dang / snyoms par zhugs pa dang / 'gro ba gzhan
329a5('dul ba): du gnas pa dang / tha dad du gnas pa dang / khas len pa dang / mi ning dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba nas/ rgyas par dang po mi thun pa can gyi bar la chos gos slong na cir
329a6('dul ba): 'gyur lags nyes byas so// chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas kho na'o// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa/ dge 'dun gyi dben bgyid
329a7('dul ba): pa dang / dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa dang / bslab pa bstsal ba la chos gos slong na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes bya'o//
329a8('dul ba): chos gos thob na cir 'gyur lags spang ba'i tu byed du 'gyur ro// // sdom la/ mi rung ba dang bzhi tshan ni// gnyis dang de bzhin tshan dang ni// dge slong dang ni dge
329b1('dul ba): slong ma// chog su yang dag bshad bu yin// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa las chos gos blangs kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta
329b2('dul ba): mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod de/ 'di ltar chos gos de'i spun rung bar 'gyur la// rgyu mi rung ba dang / spun mi rung bar gyur la rgyu rung ba dang / gnyi
329b3('dul ba): ga mi rung bar gyur ste/ mi rung ba ni rnga bal dang / ba lang gyis spu dang / ri dgas kyi ba la dang / ra bal dang / 'dres pa dang ma brtags pa'o// de lta bu'i
329b4('dul ba): chos gos shig blangs na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma nyes du ma lags par 'du shes pas chos gos len na
329b5('dul ba): cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la nye dur 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do// dge slong ma
329b6('dul ba): nye du ma lags par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so// dge slong ma nye du la nye dur 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do// btsun pa re shig
329b7('dul ba): dge slong gis dge slong ma nye bu ma lags pa bsnyen pa rdzogs pa la bsnyen pa rdzogs par 'du shes pas chos gos blangs na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyu ro// /
329b8('dul ba): nyed ma lags pa bsnyen pa rdzogs pa la bsnyen pa ma rdzogs par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// nye du ma lags pa bsnyen pa la rdzogs pa la bsnyen par rdzogs par
330a1('dul ba): 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so// nye du ma lags pa bsnyen par ma rdzogs par la bsnyen pa ma rdzogs par 'du shes 'gyur lags/ nyes byaso//
330a2('dul ba): btsun pa re shig bsnyen pa ma rdzogs par dge slong ma nyid du ma lags pa la chos gos blangs nas bsnyen pa ma rdzogs par grub na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so// bsnyen
330a3('dul ba): pa ma rdzogs par blangs la/ bsnyen pa rdzogs par grub na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so// bsnyen pa ma rdzogs par blangs la/ bsnyen pa rdzogs par grub

330a6('dul ba): byas so// bsnyen pa rdzogs nas blangs la/ bsnyen pa rdzogs te grub na cir 'gyur lags/ spangs pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// bsnyen pa rdzogs nas blangs la/

330b1('dul ba): slong du rnyed nas blangs na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa las chos gos len pa las/ dge slong

330b3('dul ba): gos len pa las/ dge slong des mtshan gyur te/ dge slong mar red pa las/ blangs na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// btsun pa re shig bslab pa bskul
330b4('dul ba): pas dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa las chos gos len na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ yang dge slong gang
330b5('dul ba): dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa las chos gos len na brjes pa ma rtogs te spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa dge slong ma dang / dge tshul ma las len na cing

330b7('dul ba): ma las blangs na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so// dge tshul gyis dge slong ma dang / dge slong ma dang / dge tshul ma las chos gos len na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so//

331a1('dul ba): dang / tshor ba 'on pa glen pa dang // gnyid logar ro rab myos dang // snyoms zhugs 'gro dang phyi rol pa'o// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

331a3('dul ba): gos slong na dus ma togs te/ spang ba'i ltung byed do// de la dus ni 'di yin te dge slong chos gos thogs sam chos gos nyams sam chos gos khyer ram/ chos

331a8('dul ba): gis mchis zang nye du ma lags pa sems 'khrugs pa dang / tshor bas nyam thag pa dang / 'on pa dang / glen pa dang / gnyid kyis log pa dang / phyag las khom pa dang /

331b5('dul ba): kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du ma 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khod yod de/ 'di ltar chos gos de'i spun rung ba ra~M pa la rgyu mi rung ba dang / rgyu
331b6('dul ba): rung bar gyur lo spun mi rung por dang / gnyi ga mi rung bar gyur pa ste/ mi rung ba la ni rnga mo'i bal dang / ba lang gi spu dang / ri dgas kyi bal dang / ra
331b7('dul ba): bal dang 'dres pa dang / thags sum brtags pa'i de lta bu'i chos gos shig blang na/ slong ba de la nyes byas so// chos gos thob na yang nyes byas

333b3('dul ba): g.yogs dang bcas pa dang / dge slong gis stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas pa'o// dge slong gis khyim pa'i stod g.yogs smad g.yogs dang bcas

334a1('dul ba): g.yogs dang bcas pa las lhag par bslang na nyes byas su 'gyur ro// dge slong gis dge slong gis stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dang

334a3('dul ba): sbyin na/ dge slong gis stod g.yogs dang smad g.yogs dang bcas pa las lhag par ma byin na/ nyes byasu 'gyu ro// gzhung lhag ma ni bslab pa'i bzhi snga ma la/

334a7('dul ba): pas chos gos kyis rin dgas spags nas/ bdag gis chos gos kyis rin 'di dag gis chos gos 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig nyos la/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'ongs

334b2('dul ba): ba'i phyir khyim bdag gis chung ma nye du ma yin pa'i de'i gan du song nas 'di skad ces/ tshe dang ldan pas bdag gis chos gos kyis rin/ gang dag lpags pa'i chos gos

335a4('dul ba): kho na'o// // sdom la/ mi rung ba dang bzhi tshan gnyis// de bzhin du ni mtshan yang dang // za ma ma ning mo nyid dang // ma ning dang ni dge slong nyid// btsun

335a6('dul ba): byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod de// 'di ltar chos gos de'i spun rung bar gyur la rgyu mi rung ba dang / rgyu rung bar gyur la spun mi ru

335b1('dul ba): lta bu'i chos gos kyis phyir rnam par rtogs par rigs nas/ chos gos blangs te thob na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so// btsun pa re shig dge slong khyim bdag
335b2('dul ba): gem/ khyim bdag gis mchis brang nye du ma lags pa la/ nye du ma lags par 'du shes pas na cir rnam par rtog par rig nas chos gos slong na cir

350b8('dul ba): gnas par mi bya ba dang / dang po ni mthun pa can pa la lug bal khrur stsol na car 'gyur lags nyes byas so// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma dge 'dun gi
351a1('dul ba): dben bgyis pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag 'byin pa dang / tha dad du gnas pa dang / bslab pa stsal pa la lug bal khrur
351a2('dul ba): stsol na cir 'gyur lags spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re shig bslab pa gtsal bas dge slong ma nye du ma lags pa la lug bal 'khrur gastsol na
351a3('dul ba): cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// // sdom la/ bsgrub bya shes tsam bkrus pa dang // dge 'dun gyi dang mtshan gnyis dang // mi rung ba dang
351a4('dul ba): spangs pa dang / de bzhin du ni mnyen nyid dang // bzhi tshan dag tu byas pa dang // dge slong ma ni tha ma yin// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags

351a6('dul ba): zhig 'khrus bstsol na cir 'gyur lags nyes byaso// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge 'dun gyi lug bal khrur bstsol na cir 'gyur lags/ gal te gang
351a7('dul ba): zag gir yongs spyad de dri ma can du byas pa zhig na nyes byas su 'gyuraro// 'on te gnas lam gyis dngos po zhig 'khrur bcug na ni ltung ba med do// btsun pa re shig
351a8('dul ba): dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma lags par la lug bal khrur stsol na ba las tshan gyur te/ dge slong mar red nas cir 'gyur lags// nyes byas so// btsun
351b1('dul ba): ba re shig dge slong mas dge slong nye du ma lags pa lug bal khrur stsol ba las mtshan gyur te/ dge slong du red na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// btsun pa
351b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong gi dge slong ma la nye du ma lags pa la/ lug bal 'khrur 'jug na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa gang lags/

351b8('dul ba): ma rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyen par rdzogs kar lags par bgyis na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// bsnyen par rdzogs par sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyen par

352b1('dul ba): bsnyen par 'du shes pas cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// dge slong gis nye du ma lags pa dge slob ma dang / dge tshul ma dang / khyim pa mo dang / gzhan mu stegs

357b4('dul ba): nyes byas so// snod thob na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas kho na'o// 'dul ba bzhud bla ma// / bam po bdun pa//

357b6('dul ba): de bzhin du ma ning dang / ma ning mo dang / mtshan gnyis pa las lhung bzed gnyis pa tshol na cir 'gyur logs nyes byas so lhung bzed thob na cir 'gyur lags
357b7('dul ba): nyes byas kho na'o// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis lhung bzed sprad bzod pa mchis bzhin du lhung bzed gnyis pa bslangs pa las mtshan gyur te/ dge slong mar

358a1('dul ba): bstsal ba las mtshan gyur te/ dge slong du red nas thob na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyuraro// btsun pa re shig dge

358a3('dul ba): mtshan gyur te/ mtshan gyur nas thob na cir 'gyur lags spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re shig dge slong mas lhung bzed spyad bzod pa mchis bzhin

358a5('dul ba): na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// bsnyen par rdzogs par bslangs la/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs par grub na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byaso//

358a7('dul ba): na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so// bsnyen par rdzogs par bslangs la/ bsnyen par rdzogs kar grub na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// bsnyen par rdzogs

358b8('dul ba): slong gis/ dge slong gis yo byad dag gam/ rin gyis lhung bzed gnyis po tshol na cir 'gyur lags ltung ba med do// btsun pa re shig bslab pa bstsal pas/
359a1('dul ba): lhung bzed spyad bzod pa mchis bzhin du/ lhung bzed gnyis pa tshol na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// 6/ lhung bzed thob na cir 'gyur lags/
359a2('dul ba): spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re shig dge slong mas lhung bzed spyad bzod mchis bzhin du lhung bzed gnyis pa tshol na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so//

359a7('dul ba): dge slong gang rang gis spangs pa'i dogs pas/ tha ga pa nye du ma yin pa la/ chos gos 'thag tu 'jug na chos gos grub na spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyu ro zhes gsungs

359b1('dul ba): byas so// de bzhin du yi ge dang lag brda' dang / gzhan la rnyed 'dog pa dang / rgyud pa dang / gzhan gyis slad du tha ga pa lags pa la chos gos 'tha' du bskul

361b1('dul ba): 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa thag pa shes par bgyis shig/ chos gos 'di kho bo'i phyir thag gis tshe dang ldan pa thag pa chos gos 'di bzang po zhing che ba dang // khru ring /

364b4('dul ba): par rdzogs kar phrogs pa'i sbyor ba bgyis la/ bsnyen par rdzogs kar phrogs na cir 'gyur lag/ nyes byaso/ bsnyen par rdzogs kar 'phrogs pa'i sbyor ba bgyis la

364b6('dul ba): spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyu ro// bsnyen par rdzog nas phrogs pa'i spor ba bgyis la/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs par phrogs na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byaso// btsun pa re shig bslab
364b7('dul ba): ba gastsal pas/ dge slong la chos go bskul nas 'phrog gam/ 'phrog du stsal na cir 'gyur lags nyes byaso// spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyu ro// btsun pa re shig dge slong gi
364b8('dul ba): dge slong ma la chos go gastsal na/ phrog gam/ phrog du stsal na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas/ btsun pa re shig dge slong mas dge slong ma la chos gos gastsal nas phrog gam
365a1('dul ba): @/ 'phrog du gastsal na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyuraro// dge slong mas dge slong dang / dge tshul dang / dge slob dang / dge tshul ma las chos go stsal nas/ phrog
365a2('dul ba): gam/ phrog du gsul na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byaso// dge slob ma dang / dge tshul dang / dge tshul ma dang / sngar ltung ba byung ba la stsogs pa la ni nyes byasu rgya cher brjod par bya'o//
365a3('dul ba): sdom la/ sems g.yengs pa dang dus las 'das/ de bzhin tshan dang thun mong dang / mi rung bzhi mtshan dus ma yin/ dge slong ma ni tha ma yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
365a4('dul ba): ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhes pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong gis ston zla 'bring po nyar zhag bcus ma tshang ba tshun chad du/ brtan pa las byung ba'i chos gos zhig
365a5('dul ba): rnyed la/ 'dod na dge slong des chos gos de blang ba bya'o// blang nas chos gos byin pa'i dus che'i bar du bcangs par bya'o// de las 'das par bcangs na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes
365a6('dul ba): gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa dge slong gi brdung ba las byung ba'i chos gos shig/ chos gos gastsal ba'i dus kyis tshe las 'das par bzhag kyang spang ba'i ltung
365a7('dul ba): byedu mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod de/ 'di ltar dge slong gis chos gos rnyed ma thag tu sems g.yengs par gyur na'o// btsun pa dge slong gis
365a8('dul ba): ji srid 'tsho'i ba'i bar du btang pa las byung ba'i chos gos bcangs kyang / spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod de/ chos gos sbran
365b1('dul ba): pa'i dus kyis nang rol du dus byas na'o// btsun pa re shig dge slong btang ba las byung ba'i chos gos shig/ chos gos gastsal pa'i dus kyi bar las 'da' bar bgyid pa las mtshan/
365b2('dul ba): gyur te/ dge slong mar red na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas// btsun pa re shig dge slong ma btang ba las byung ba'i chos gos bstsal ba'i dus kyis bar las 'da' bar bgyid pa
365b3('dul ba): las mtshan gyur te/ dge slong du ring na cir 'gyur lags nyes byaso// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis btang ba las byung ba'i chos gos thun mong ba zhig/ chos gos gsu
365b4('dul ba): ba'i dus las 'das par bzhan cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas/ btsun pa dge slong gis brtod pa las byung ba'i chos gos gastsal ba'i dus kyis bar las 'das par
365b5('dul ba): bzhag kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam nye bar 'khor yi do/ 'di ltar chos gos de'i spun rung bar gyur la/ rgyu mi rung ba dang / rgyu rung ba
365b6('dul ba): dang / rgyu rung bar bar gyur la spun rung ba dang / gnyi ga mi rung bar gyur na'o// mi rung ba ni rnga bal dang / baM lang gi spun dang / ri dgas kyi sa bal dang / 'dres pa dang ma btag
365b7('dul ba): ba ste/ de lta bu'i chos gos zhig/ chos gos stsal pa'i dus las 'das par gzhag na/ nyes byas su 'gyuraro/ btsun pa re shig dge slong gis/ chos gos bstsal pa'i dug
365b8('dul ba): la 'das pa la 'das par 'du shes pas chos gos gzhag na cir 'gyur lags spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// 'das pa la ma mangs par 'du shes pa bzhag na cir 'gyur
366a1('dul ba): lags ltung ba me / ma 'das pa la 'das par 'du shes pas bzhag na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byaso// ma 'das pa la ma 'das par 'du shes pas bzhag na cir/
366a2('dul ba): 'gyur lags/ ltung ba medo/ btsun pa dgag dbye ma bgyis par rgyal po'i shor bor na/ dge slong gis brtad chos gos ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ nye bar 'khor ji ltar
366a3('dul ba): gnas par dam bcas pa gzhan no// brtad pa las byung ba ni chos gos dgung bcu 'das pa zhes bgyi 'am/ dgung bcu 'das pa zhes mi bgyi bka' stsal pa zhag bcu 'das
366a4('dul ba): pa zhes mi bya'o// btsun pa las byung ba'i chos gos dus li ma lags pa'i chos gosu bgyir rung ba lags sam/ nye bar 'khor mi rungango / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis btang
366a5('dul ba): pa las byung ba'i chos gos/ rtogos sbyin pa'i dus kyi sa bar du chos gos chongs shig ces gsungs pa gang lags pa btsun pa chos gos bstsal ba'i dus gang lags pa/

366a7('dul ba): chos gos gastsal ba'i dus kyi bar las 'das par gzhan na cir 'gyur lags spang ba'i ltung bye du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re shig dge slong mas brtad pa las byung ba chos gos

366b5('dul ba): chos gos rje dang / 'tshams kyi phyi rol tu 'bral dgos pa de lta bu'i kye na zhig byung na/ dge slong dgon pa pa des zhag drug gi 'tha' tshun chad du/ chos gos dang mtsham

367a7('dul ba): chos gos de dang mtshams kyi slad rol du 'bral bar bgyid kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam nye bar 'khor yod de/ 'di ltar dge slong

367b8('dul ba): sngar ltung ba la stsogs pa la ni nyes byaso// // sdom la/ pho nya yi ge lag brda' dang / gzhan la snyad 'dog rgyang pa dang / smyon pa dang ni sems g.yengs pa//

368b1('dul ba): lags spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyuraro// smyon pa la ji ltar ba de bzhin du sems g.yengs pa dang / tsher bas nyam thags pa dang / glen pa dang / 'on pa dang / gnyid

371a4('dul ba): dge slong gis shes bzhin du gang zag bdag la bsgyur du bcug ste/ chos gos grub ni spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re shig bsnyen par rdzog par dge 'dun
371a5('dul ba): gyis rnyed pa bslangs la/ bsnyen pa ma rdzogs par grub na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// bsnyen par ya rdzogs par blangs la/ bsnyen par rdzogs kar grub na cing
371a6('dul ba): 'gyur lags nyes byas so// bsnyen par ma rdzogs par bslangs la/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas grub na cir lags/ nyes byas so// bsnyen par rdzogs kar blangs la/
371a7('dul ba): bsnyen par rdzogs par grub na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas su bsnyen par rdzogs nas spongs la/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas grub na cir 'gyur lags/ spang ba'i sku
371a8('dul ba): byed du 'gyur ro// bsnyen par rdzogs nas bslangs la/ bsnyen par ma rdzogs par grub na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge 'dun//
371b1('dul ba): la bsngos pa'i rnyed pa la bsngos par 'du shes pas gang zag bdag la sgyur du gastsal na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas so// rnyed pa grub na cir 'gyur lags spang ba'i
371b2('dul ba): ltung byed du 'gyur ro// bsngos pa la ma bsngos par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags// ltung ba med do// ma bsngos pa la bsngos par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lag nye bya'o//
371b3('dul ba): ma bsngos pa la ma bsngos par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge 'dun la bsngos pa'i rnyed pa she bzhin du gang
371b4('dul ba): zag bdag bsgyur du gastsol ba las mtshan gyur te/ dge slong mar rnyed nas thob na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong ma dge 'du

371b7('dul ba): nyes byas kho na'o// de bzhin du za ma dang // ma ning dang / dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang / ma 'gums pa dang / pha 'gums pa dang / dgra bcom pa 'gumasmra dang / dge 'dun gyis

372a1('dul ba): 'dul ba/ gnas pa dang / gnas par mi bgyis pa dang / khas blangs pa dang / sngar ltung ba byung ba dang / dang po mi thun pa can dang / bslab pa bstsal pa la bsngos pa'i/

372a4('dul ba): srab pa bstsal bas dge 'dun la bsngos pa'i rnye ba 'tshal bzhin du gang zag bdag la sgyur du gastsol na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byas rnyed pa grub na cir 'gyur lag/ spang ba'i ltung
372a5('dul ba): byed du 'gyuraro// btsun pa re shag dge slong mas dge 'dun la sngos pa'i rnyed pa 'tshal bzhin du gang zag bdag la sgyur du gastsol na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas so// rnyed pa grub na
372a6('dul ba): cir 'gyur lags spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ro// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong gnyis sam mang po la bsngos pa'i rnyed pa gang zag bdag la sgyur du gastsol na cir
372a7('dul ba): 'gyur lags/ nyes byaso// rnyed pa grub 'gyur lags nyes byas kho na'o// btsun pa re shig dge slong gis dge slong las dge 'dun nam/ gnyi ga'i dge 'dun la bsngos pa'i

372b1('dul ba): pa'i rnyed pa 'am/ dge slob ma dang / dge tshul/ dge tshul ma la bsngos pa'i rnyed pa gang zag bdag la bsgyur du gastsol na cing 'gyur lags nyes byaso// rnyed pa grub na cir 'gyur

372b3('dul ba): lags nyes byaso// rnyed pa grub na cir 'gyur lags nyes byas kho na'o// de bzhin du dge slob ma dang / dge tshul dang / dge tshul ma dang / snga na ltung ba byung ba la gastso
372b4('dul ba): pa la ni/ nyes byas rgya cher brjod par bya'o// / sdom la/ mi rung ba dang bzhin tshan dang / nyams dang de bzhin ji srid 'tsho// mtshan dang de nyid spyon pa dang /

372b6('dul ba): la phan pa sor bstan par bya ba'i sman gang dag bka' stsal pa/ 'di lta ste/ zhun mar dang / 'bru mar dang / sbrang rtsi dang / sbrang rtsi dang / bu ram gyis dbu pa de dag la dge
372b7('dul ba): slong na bas 'dod na/ rang gis zhag bdun par byin gyis brlabs te/ stsogs 'jog kyi yongasu long spyod pas/ yongasu longs spyad par bya'o// de las 'das par yongasu so//
372b8('dul ba): spyad par byed na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa sman dgung bdun las 'das kyang spang ba'i ltung byed du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags
373a1('dul ba): 'dul ba/ nye bar 'khor yod de/ sman mi rung ba dang 'dres pa gang dge slong rnams kyis spyad du ma rung 'gyur ba'o// btsun pa nA shig gis dge slong gi sman ni sa
373a2('dul ba): dgud bdun la du gung bdun lags par du shes pas/ skye reng 'char bar bgyid na cir 'gyur lag sa spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyuraro// dgung bdun la dgung bdun ma lags
373a3('dul ba): par 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ ltung ba med do// dgung bdun ma lags pa la dgung bdun du 'du shes na cir 'gyur lags/ nyes byaso// dgung bdun ma lags pa la/

373a5('dul ba): bshags par bgyi lags sam/ nye bar 'khor gshegs par bya'o// ltung bshags nas slar rnyed na spang bar bgyi lag sam/ nye bar 'khor ma yin no// btsun pa re
373a6('dul ba): shig dge slong gos dgung bdun pa'i sman ji srid 'tsho'i bar tu bcangs kyang spang ba'i ltung bye du mi 'gyur ba lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod do// zhag bdun tshun chad dus

373b1('dul ba): cir 'gyur lags spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyu ro// btsun pa sman de nyid spang ba yang lags la/ de nyid bstsogs 'jog bgyid pa yang lta mchis lags sam/ nye bar 'khor yod de/

373b3('dul ba): g.yengs par gyur na/ gang nas bzungs ste dgung bdun pa grang bar bgyi lags/ gang gi tshe rang gi sems sor chud pa nas so// btsun pa dus su rung ba song / thun tshong du rang

373b8('dul ba): tshod du rung ba dang / dgung bdun pa dang / ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bcad pa'i sran gang dag lags pa de dag byin len bgyis/ byin kyis brlab pa las 'das par stsogs
374a1('dul ba): 'dul ba cang / #'jog gis yongs su spyad du rung lags sam/ nye ba 'khor mi rung ste/ dus su rung ba lang dus su spyad par bya'i dus 'das na yongasu spyad par mi bya'o//

374a3('dul ba): zhag bdun las yongasu 'das par spyad par mi bya'i/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bcas ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yongs su spyad par bya'o// gal te yongasu spyad na cir

374b1('dul ba): / dang ni sems g.yengs dang / tshor ba 'on pa glen pa'o// gnyid log ra ro rab myos dang / snyoms zhugs 'gro ba tha ma'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang

375a1('dul ba): pa la mi dben par 'du shes pas brdzun du sma na cir 'gyur lags ltung byed do// btsun pa re shigs dbus kyis dge slong gis/ 'tha' khob pa'i skad
